org.jlab.cnuphys.histogram

Class Histogram3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.cnuphys.histogram.Histogram3D

  • public class Histogram3D
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the definition for creating and modifying 3-D Histograms.
    Version:
    061714
    Author:
    Erin Kirby

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates an empty 3-D Histogram with the specified name.

      Creates a 3-D Histogram with the specified parameters.

      Finds the bin with that value and increments it by 1.0

      • Histogram3D

        public Histogram3D(java.lang.String name,
           int bx,
           double xMin,
           double xMax,
           int by,
           double yMin,
           double yMax,
           int bz,
           double zMin,
           double zMax)
        Creates a 3-D Histogram with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the histogram
        bx - The number of x bins
        xMin - The minimum x value
        xMax - The maximum x value
        by - The number of y bins
        yMin - The minimum y value
        yMax - The maximum y value
        bz - The number of z bins
        zMin - The minimum z value
        zMax - The maximum z value

      • getRegion

        public Histogram3D getRegion(java.lang.String name,
                    int bx_start,
                    int bx_end,
                    int by_start,
                    int by_end,
                    int bz_start,
                    int bz_end)
        Creates a 3-D Histogram of the indicated region
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new 3-D Histogram region
        bx_start - The beginning x bin of the region
        bx_end - The ending x bin of the region
        by_start - The beginning y bin of the region
        by_end - The ending x bin of the region
        bz_start - The beginning z bin of the region
        bz_end - The ending z bin of the region
        Returns:
        A new 3-D Histogram of just the specified region
